00025 class EffectRepeat:public Effect
00026 {
00027  friend class RepeatDialog;
00028 
00029  public:
00030    EffectRepeat();
00031 
00032    virtual wxString GetEffectName() {
00033       return wxString(_("Repeat..."));
00034    }
00035 
00036    virtual std::set<wxString> GetEffectCategories() {
00037       std::set<wxString> result;
00038       result.insert(wxT("http://audacityteam.org/namespace#TimelineChanger"));
00039       return result;
00040    }
00041 
00042    virtual wxString GetEffectIdentifier() {
00043       return wxString(wxT("Repeat"));
00044    }
00045 
00046    virtual wxString GetEffectAction() {
00047       return wxString(_("Performing Repeat"));
00048    }
00049    
00050    // Useful only after PromptUser values have been set. 
00051    virtual wxString GetEffectDescription(); 
00052 
00053    virtual bool PromptUser();
00054    virtual bool TransferParameters( Shuttle & shuttle );
00055    
00056    virtual bool Process();
00057 
00058  private:
00059    int repeatCount;
00060 };
